thread.title: BRIEF-Boot Barn Holdings Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.24

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Boot Barn Holdings Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.24
text:
May 15 (Reuters) - Boot Barn Holdings Inc:
* BOOT BARN HOLDINGS, INC. ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND FISCAL YEAR 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.24 * Q4 SALES $170.8 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $163.7 MILLION
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.16 â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SEES FY 2019 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.92 TO $1.02 * QTRLY NET SALES INCREASED TO $170.8 MILLION, DRIVEN BY A 12.1% INCREASE IN SAME STORE SALES
* BOOT BARN HOLDINGS - SEES Q1 SAME STORE SALES GROWTH OF APPROXIMATELY 10%
* SEES 2019 SAME STORE SALES GROWTH OF MID-SINGLE DIGITS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
